ParsGBIF 1.0.0.0
  • Reference

    batch_checkName_wcvp

    batch_checkName_wcvp.Rd

    Use the World Checklist of Vascular Plants (WCVP) database to check accepted names and update synonyms, in batch

    batch_checkName_wcvp(
  occ = NA,
  wcvp_names = wcvp_names,
  if_author_fails_try_without_combinations = TRUE,
  wcvp_selected_fields = "standard"
)

    Arguments

    occ

    GBIF occurrence table with selected columns as select_gbif_fields(columns = 'standard')

    wcvp_names

    WCVP table, wcvp_names.csv file from http://sftp.kew.org/pub/data-repositories/WCVP/

    if_author_fails_try_without_combinations

    option for partial verification of the authorship of the species. Remove the authors of combinations, in parentheses

    wcvp_selected_fields

    WCVP fields selected as return, 'standard' basic columns, 'all' all available columns

    Value

    occ_checkName_wcvp: wcvp_plant_name_id, wcvp_taxon_rank, wcvp_taxon_status, wcvp_family, wcvp_taxon_name, wcvp_taxon_authors, wcvp_accepted_plant_name_id, wcvp_reviewed, wcvp_searchedName, wcvp_taxon_status_of_searchedName, wcvp_plant_name_id_of_searchedName, wcvp_taxon_authors_of_searchedName, wcvp_verified_author, wcvp_verified_speciesName, wcvp_searchNotes summary

    Details

    See help(checkName_wcvp) and https://powo.science.kew.org/about-wcvp

    See also

    get_wcvp, checkName_wcvp

    Author

    Pablo Hendrigo Alves de Melo, Nadia Bystriakova & Alexandre Monro

    Examples

    # load package
library(ParsGBIF)

help(batch_checkName_wcvp)

wcvp_names <- get_wcvp(read_only_to_memory = TRUE)$wcvp_names
#> Loading required package: dplyr
#> 
#> Attaching package: ‘dplyr’
#> The following objects are masked from ‘package:stats’:
#> 
#>     filter, lag
#> The following objects are masked from ‘package:base’:
#> 
#>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union
#> [1] "downloading: http://sftp.kew.org/pub/data-repositories/WCVP//wcvp.zip"
#> [1] "loading: /tmp/RtmpOx6El6/wcvp_names.csv"
#> [1] " wcvp_names :1419265"
#> Warning: cannot remove file '/tmp/RtmpOx6El6/downlit', reason 'Directory not empty'

occ <- prepare_gbif_occurrence_data(gbif_occurrece_file =  'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/pablopains/ParsGBIF/main/dataGBIF/Achatocarpaceae/occurrence.txt',
                                    columns = 'standard')
#> Loading required package: readr
#> Warning: One or more parsing issues, call `problems()` on your data frame for details,
#> e.g.:
#>   dat <- vroom(...)
#>   problems(dat)

res_batch_checkName_wcvp <- batch_checkName_wcvp(occ = occ,
                                                 wcvp_names =  wcvp_names,
                                                 if_author_fails_try_without_combinations = TRUE,
                                                 wcvp_selected_fields = 'standard')
